level.heading: Definitions; applicability and scope; standards for policy provisions; filing requirements; master policy and certificate; loss ratio standards; disclosure standards; outline of coverage; notice of free examination; filing requirements for advertising; remedies; rules.
Temporary Amendments of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) repeal of§§ 35-2601 to 35-2610 [1981 Ed.], see § 2 of Medicare Supplement Insurance Minimum Standard Temporary Act of 1992 (D.C. Law 9-133, July 22, 1992, law notification 39 DCR 5814).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 9-170, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-3701.
